alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 1:34AM CST until February 22 at 2:11AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Marengo and Hale Counties. .Heavy rainfall has occurred during the past 24 hours over the Black Warrior River basin and a flood warning is now in effect for the Black Warrior River. Another statement will be issued by this afternoon, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 90.0 feet, Pasture and wood lands begin to flood. Livestock should be moved to higher ground at stages above 90 feet. At 94.0 feet, Some secondary roads in the area begin to flood. Flooding of farm and pasture lands continues. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:15 AM CST Friday the stage was 76.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 92.9 feet early Sunday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 90.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
